name: Snails vs Aliens
description:
Snails vs Aliens

Snails vs Aliens is a classic side scrolling shooter. Aliens attack the earth but this is no easy match. The snails are equiped with strong weaponsystems to defend their planet. Can you defeat the aliens and save the whole planet?

Features

- 7 Levels

- 6 Bosses

- Optional submissions

- Own graphics and music

- Upgradesystem

- Primary and secundary weapons

- Shop

Controls

W A S D = walk

SPACE = shoot

CRTL = missles

  • L = smartbomb
  • *
